Package org.apache.mesos.scheduler.plan

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Block
    Defines the interface for a Block of a Phase.
    BlockFactory
    An implementation of this interface should provide Blocks based on TaskSpecifications.
    Element<C extends Element>
    An Element is a generic component in a tree of elements.
    Phase
    Defines the interface for one Phase within a Plan.
    PhaseFactory
    A PhaseFactory transforms TaskSets into Phases.
    Plan
    Defines the interface for one or more Phases, along with any errors encountered while processing those Phases.
    PlanCoordinator
    PlanCoordinator's job is to coordinate offers among configured PlanManagers.
    PlanFactory
    Created by gabriel on 10/15/16.
    PlanManager
    PlanManager is the management interface for Plans.
    PlanScheduler
    Interface for Plan schedulers.
    StageBuilder
    Interface for objects that build Plans.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultBlock
    This class is a default implementation of the Block interface.
    DefaultBlockFactory
    This class is a default implementation of the BlockFactory interface.
    DefaultBlockTest
    This class tests the DefaultBlock class.
    DefaultPhase
    Default Phase implementation tracks Blocks both by their UUID and by their ordering.
    DefaultPhaseBuilder
    The DefaultPhaseBuilder allows the construction of a Phase with a custom @{link Strategy} defined by the expressed dependencies.
    DefaultPhaseBuilderTest
    This class tests the DefaultPhaseBuilder.
    DefaultPhaseFactory
    This class generates Phases given PhaseSpecifications.
    DefaultPlan
    An ordered list of Phases, composed into a Plan.
    DefaultPlanBuilder
    The DefaultPlanBuilder allows the construction of a Plan with a custom @{link Strategy} defined by the expressed dependencies.
    DefaultPlanBuilderTest
    This class tests the DefaultPlanBuilder.
    DefaultPlanCoordinator
    Default implementation of PlanCoordinator.
    DefaultPlanCoordinatorTest
    Tests for DefaultPlanCoordinator.
    DefaultPlanFactory
    Given a StateStore and a PlanSpecification the DefaultPlanFactory can generate a Plan.
    DefaultPlanManager
    Provides the default implementation of a PlanManager.
    DefaultPlanManagerTest
    This class tests the DefaultPlanManager.
    DefaultPlanScheduler
    Default deployment scheduler.
    DefaultPlanSchedulerTest
    Tests for DefaultPlanScheduler.
    ElementBuilder<P extends Element<C>,C extends Element>
    An ElementBuilder allows the construction of a composite element such that the description of dependencies constructs a custom Strategy.
    PlanUtils
    Commons utility methods for PlanManagers.
    RandomRecoveryStrategyTest
    Tests for RandomStrategy.
    ReconciliationBlock
    Block that implements Reconciliation between the Mesos Master and a framework.
    ReconciliationBlockTest
    Tests for ReconciliationBlock.
    ReconciliationPhase
    Phase that implements reconciliation.
    TestBlock
    This class is an implementation of the Block interface for test purposes.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Status
    Status of an Element.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Block.InvalidBlockException
    Thrown on invalid Block construction attempt.
